body.raw:
# Hello World Welcome to my minimalist blog. This is a sample post to demonstrate the MDX capabilities. ## Code Example ```javascript function hello() { console.log("Hello, world!"); } ``` ## Custom Component Example
This is a custom component rendered with JSX in MDX.
## Typography Regular paragraph text looks like this. **Bold text** and *italic text* are supported. > This is a blockquote. It's great for highlighting important information. - List item one - List item two - List item three 1. Numbered item one 2. Numbered item two 3. Numbered item three --- That's it for this sample post!
